title: Big Data – Big opportunities – Big risks? And what about Europe?
segmentation: So thanks to the organization for the opportunity for me to share.
My experience telephone experience in the space of Big Data.

Anne.
Very briefly in.
Review a bit of context about Telefonica as a digital company.
Big data opportunity.

Some words on what is actually big data, because I think there are many.
There's lots of confusions, some of the risks that I've seen as very crucial in making this happening, and then what kind of role can we play as a business in the big data space?

And then I'm going onto the euro part.
